definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Jewish name in Persian period (God delivers; from Aram. [[שֵׁיזֵיב]], 4awzeb deliver, As. šûzubu, Shaph. from ezêbu, deliver, Dl:HWB 35; cf. the Bab. names Mušizib-Marduk, ‘Marduk delivers,’ Mušizib-í lu, KB:ii. 28l, iv. 129):—grandfather of one of the wall-builders Ne 3:4; one of those sealed Ne 10:22; father of royal officer (a Judaean) Ne 11:24; the relation of these to each other is unknown; LXX Masezebha, Meswzebhl, LXXL Massizabel, etc.
